name: Update Google Sheets with form responses from Formstack for emails and send a Skype message
description: Every time a new form response is submitted with Formstack, Make will automatically validate the email address from the form using ZeroBounce. If the status of the email is "valid", it will add a row to a Google Sheet and send a Skype message. If the email status is not "valid" it will send a Skype message. This example uses the sheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1l205VTOGWG-wurkvc2UmsbVnN0cJbX-6evHJnWcMfaM/edit#gid=0).
